mapper.select: select sv_id, sv_title, sv_writer, to_char(sv_startdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') sv_startdate, to_char(sv_enddate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') sv_enddate, sv_hits, sv_count, sv_state from survey order by sv_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into survey (sv_id, sv_title, sv_writer, sv_startdate, sv_enddate, sv_hits, sv_count, sv_state) values( #{sv_id}, #{sv_title}, #{sv_writer}, #{sv_startdate}, #{sv_enddate}, #{sv_hits}, #{sv_count}, #{sv_state} )
mapper.update: update survey set sv_id=#{sv_id}, sv_title=#{sv_title}, sv_writer=#{sv_writer}, sv_startdate=#{sv_startdate}, sv_enddate= #{sv_enddate}, sv_hits=#{sv_hits}, sv_count=#{sv_count}, sv_state=#{sv_state}
mapper.select: select sv_id, sv_title, sv_writer, to_char(sv_startdate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') sv_startdate, to_char(sv_enddate, 'yyyy.MM.dd') sv_enddate, sv_hits, sv_count, sv_state from SURVEY where sv_id in (select DISTINCT s.sv_id from member m join SURVEY_RESULT r on r.M_ID = m.M_ID join SURVEY_LIST l on r.LIST_ID = l.LIST_ID join SURVEY s on s.SV_ID=l.SV_ID where m.M_ID = #{m_id} )
select list_id,sv_id,LIST_CONTENT from survey_list where sv_id = #{sv_id}
select sv_title from survey where sv_id = #{sv_id}

select survey_list.LIST_CONTENT,round((survey_list.list_chnum/survey.sv_count)*100,1) as percent from survey join survey_list on survey.sv_id = survey_list.sv_id where survey_list.sv_id = #{sv_id} order by survey_list.list_id asc
